title: pattini kastUribAi
sahitya:
pattini kastUribAi engaL bhArata dEviyin uttama puttiri


anupallavi

  satyAgrahamenum shakti namakkaLitta shAnta guru mahAtmA gAndhiyin uyirAna


caraNam    gItaiyin vaDivAga kristuvaip-pOnraruL kiraNam paravum mahAn mEdiniyil asura vEgam 
taNiya anbu vratam kaDaip-piDittOn bOdhisattuvavAna buddhanaip-pOnravan bhUmiyilE 
periyOn porumai mighu gAndhiyin arumait-tuNaiviyAgap-perumai siranda nalla urimaip-paNI purinda
